verses.roman:
eta bali' sabe phire prabhure cāhiyā
samudrera tīre āilā kata jana lañā

synonyms: eta bali'-saying this; sabe—all of them; phire—wander; prabhure cāhiyā—looking for Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; samudrera tīre—on the seashore; āilā—arrived; kata—many; jana—people; lañā—accompanied by.
translation: Talking like this, the devotees wandered here and there looking for the Lord. Finally they came to the shore, accompanied by many others.
